lead_paragraph: The secretary of state called for efforts to reduce unemployment and other programs that could dissuade young people from joining militant causes, even if such initiatives were costly.
snippet: The secretary of state called for efforts to reduce unemployment and other programs that could dissuade young people from joining militant causes, even if such initiatives were costly.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Kerry, at Davos, Urges Multipronged Fight Against Violent Extremism
